guide.conclusion: See how easy it was to create a gorgeous HDR photo? Now get out there and shoot, shoot, shoot!

lines.text: HDR photos can be incredibly beautiful. First, you want to find a great shot that has a lot of contract - dark shadows and really bright highlights work best.
lines.text_raw: HDR photos can be incredibly beautiful. First, you want to find a great shot that has a lot of contract - dark shadows and really bright highlights work best.

lines.text: You must use a tripod when shooting your series of images to combine into an HDR shot. This is so the photos match perfectly.
lines.text_raw: You must use a tripod when shooting your series of images to combine into an HDR shot. This is so the photos match perfectly.

lines.text: Shoot 3 exposures without moving the camera.
lines.text_raw: Shoot 3 exposures without moving the camera.

lines.text: Make one very overexposed, one normally exposed and one very underexposed.
